recipes.name: pizza
recipes.author: Lorenzo
recipes.description: Pizza is a dish of Italian origin consisting of a usually round, flat base of leavened wheat-based dough topped with tomatoes, cheese, and often various other ingredients, which is then baked at a high temperature, traditionally in a wood-fired oven. A small pizza is sometimes called a pizzetta.
recipes.instructions: To make pizza, you'll need some dough, tomato sauce, cheese, and any toppings you desire. Begin by rolling out the dough into a round shape, and spread tomato sauce over it. Sprinkle shredded cheese and toppings over the sauce, then bake the pizza in a preheated oven for 10-15 minutes or until the crust is golden brown. Finally, slice and serve your delicious homemade pizza!

recipes.name: noodles
recipes.author: Jung-hoon
recipes.description: Korean noodles, also known as 'guksu' in Korean, are a type of thin, wheat-based noodles commonly used in Korean cuisine. They can be served hot or cold, and are often used in soups, stir-fries, and salads. Korean noodles are a popular and versatile ingredient in Korean cuisine, and are enjoyed by many around the world.
recipes.instructions: To prepare the noodles, bring a pot of salted water to a boil. Add the noodles and cook for 3-4 minutes, stirring occasionally, until they are tender but still slightly firm. Drain the noodles and rinse them under cold water.Finally, serve the Korean noodles with your choice of toppings and sauces, such as sliced beef, mushrooms, carrots, scallions, soy sauce, and sesame oil. Enjoy as a delicious and satisfying meal!

recipes.name: momo
recipes.author: Shree
recipes.description: Nepalese momo is a type of dumpling that is a popular street food in Nepal and other parts of South Asia. It is typically filled with ground meat, such as chicken or lamb, and a variety of vegetables and spices, then steamed or fried. The dumpling is served with a spicy dipping sauce, which adds a tangy and flavorful kick to the dish. Nepalese momo is a delicious and hearty snack or meal that is perfect for any occasion.
recipes.instructions: The dough is rolled very thin, the filling is placed in the center, and then the momo is shaped and sealed into small packets, leaving some space for it to fill with broth that collects during steaming process.

recipes.name: burger
recipes.author: Oliver
recipes.description: The American burger is a quintessential culinary icon that represents the heart of American comfort food. A juicy, flame-grilled beef patty serves as the centerpiece, nestled between two soft and toasted sesame seed buns. Topped with melted cheese, crisp lettuce, ripe tomatoes, tangy pickles, and a smear of mayo or ketchup, it creates a harmonious balance of flavors and textures. The first bite reveals a satisfying explosion of savory juices, while the combination of ingredients delivers a symphony of tastes that embodies indulgence and familiarity, making it a beloved classic across the United States and beyond.
recipes.instructions: Preheat a grill or frying pan. Mix ground beef with salt and black pepper. Shape into patties and cook for 4-5 minutes per side. Assemble on toasted buns with cheese, lettuce, tomato, pickles, onions, and condiments.Serve immediately and enjoy your delicious American burger!
